name: Pokemon Mystos
description:
My work in progress pokemon fangame. Current idea is a pokemon game with a slightly more open feel and a stronger focus on collecting pokemon over battling, though battling is still a big part of the game.

When I say this is very work in progress, I mean VERY work in progress. Currently there are less than 3 minutes of gameplay as I uploaded this mostly to figure out the upload process. I do not recommend playing this yet at all and I imagine its gonna be a bit before there's even an hours worth of content in here.
